Enjoy an easier and happier life!
body.description: 1.Multifunction PocketMulti pocket make organization extremely simple.2.Exquisite Workmanship - Three layers protective material-the outside splash proof cloth, the insides strong panel, smooth lining. - The entire surface of back side using multilayer honeycomb mesh elastic soam, comfortable and breathable - The lower part of the strap is reversible, can be used left or right3.Best Gift Ideas It's a nice gifts for your husband,son,boyfriend,brother,friends in birthday, Festival, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year etc. 4. Easy to maintain Surface fabric is easy to clean, just used a damp cloth to remove the dirt. Not recommend washing by machine. Remove the USB cable, wash in warm water by hand.5. Tips: Please allow slight 2-3cm manual measurement deviation, thanks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality, decent amount of space for a lot of things, love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ultimate Man Bag
reviews.reviewText: Love it! Perfect for cell phones, chargers, keys, bottles of water, etc. that you have to carry or your girl asks you to carry. Also great for carrying a piece for self defense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly What I Ordered
reviews.reviewText: Nice product with and even better price. Functional, attractive looking and affordable. What more could you want?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sophisticated look. Affordable price.
reviews.reviewText: The overal desing and functionality is very good. There is no way an iPad can fit in there with a cover as the room is juuuust enough for one as it is. The zippers are solid and don't bind. I use it primarily as a (licensed) concealed carry bag as my pistol is very heavy but the wide shoulder strap does a great job in spreading the weight over a large area making it very confortable to carry. Plenty of room for keys, phone and assorted small items. The USB port worked without issue. The hidden water bottle holder is neat but has a tough time fitting a 20oz. Topo Chico bottle. If you are using a skikkier type of water bottle, it should work ok. I am only deducting one star because while the outer material looks stylish from afar, once you get close to it, you can easly tell its a cheap leather imitation. Looks similar to the "leatherette" material used on many entry level car interiors. Despite its æsthetic shortcomings upclose, it offers good value for the money and I am happy with my purchase. Highly recommend if you need a stylish carry option and grew tired of tacti-cool look of the Maxpedition type of bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just amazing, great material !!! Exactly What I was looking for !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Organize
reviews.reviewText: I like all the different compartments.I like the size of this sling and the fact you can change the strap to either side of the bag.This is better than a small backpact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful bag! The quilted design is gorgeous. The inside is spacious and I love the strap style because I can wear it across my chest. It’ll be perfect for my upcoming trip to Austria/Italy to prevent theft because I can wear it in front of me comfortably.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bag for the money!
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing. Its not too small. Its not TOO big. AND, it has a usb port on the outside (don't forget to get a powerbank). No cons for me on this one.
